messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption?
ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption provides two custom nodes to load and save images with captions as separate files in ComfyUI.
How many custom nodes are included in ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption?
What functionality do the custom nodes in ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption provide?
The custom nodes in ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption provide the functionality to load and save images with captions as separate files.
Does ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption allow saving captions separately from the images?
Yes, ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption allows saving captions as separate files from the images.
Is there a visual representation of ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption available?
Yes, there is a screenshot provided that shows the visual representation of ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption.
What is the file format of the screenshot showing ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption?
The screenshot showing ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption is in PNG format.
Can ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption be used to load existing images with captions?
Yes, ComfyUI-Save-Image-Caption provides a custom node that can be used to load existing images with captions.
